hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Tuesday Orange - Sunset
hiveArticle.body:
The image is not that great or clear as I have to zoomit, but I am able to capture the Sun peeping through the cloud along with the rays emerging out from the cloud. I have taken this image from a busy road of Bangalore.

![IMG_20180409_181559.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdpRW8nfVwvz2pJ4UScioZZSjSxyz952wEEE6ULofFrLt/IMG_20180409_181559.jpg)

![IMG_20180409_181604.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPUihqQ5oU7hsTiEbyeRy6VAxTfML7usDhvVE8pC9fGsF/IMG_20180409_181604.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
